Research

From conference

I regularly participate in national and international conferences related to text mining, data science, and statistical analysis of textual data.

Here are some recent highlights from my teaching and conference presentations:

Teaching at University of Padova

TALL session

Data Science and Social Research Conference

JADT 2024 – Université Saint-Louis Bruxelles

Journal Articles
